title: 88 E Dho Wath Man Loka Nam

lines: 1. E dho wath man loka nam;Pewe rieny kuno malerNitie duol moluongaee;nyaka aret adhi kanyo.
Koro adhi ok adwar dekoNikech Ruoth e ma luongaWe adhi nyak` awinj RuodhaJopinywa koro oritu.
2. Awinjo Ruoth kowacho,Un jokeyo ret uruNikech puothe nimabor,jopinywa we uru adhi.
3. E apaka mogingorebat moting`e ma nenoNe rangeye bende oyawkendo jomolal luonga.
4. Wuonwa, minwa,nyithindwa nyaka agonu oritiNikech dho wath nam mabornitie tich ma Ruoth luonga.
